attributes.action: 10 years for causing death by dangerous driving or over the drink drive limit.
attributes.additional_details: Time and time again I see reports in the press and media where a driver is convicted of causing death by dangerous driving or driving while intoxicated. The sentence is rarely more than a few years. It's disappointing that this is somehow considered "justice".
attributes.background: Too many short sentences are given which do not reflect the seriousness of the crime of killing somebody just because the perpetrator is driving a car. This needs to be redressed if a meaningful deterrant is to be effective.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase sentences for death by dangerous driving cases & lifetime driving bans: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578391

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for drink/drug driving, plus lifetime ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588375
